name: Wp photo text slider 50
author: Gopi Ramasamy

sections.description:
Wp photo text slider 50 this is an another JQuery based slideshow plugin for wordpress. We can create the beautiful slideshow with this plugin.

Check official website for Live demo and Video tutorial http://www.gopiplus.com/work/2011/06/02/wordpress-plugin-wp-photo-slider-50/

  • Live Demo
  • Video tutorial
  • More Information
  • Download link

Wp photo text slider 50 this is an another JQuery based slideshow plugin for wordpress. We can create the beautiful slideshow with this plugin the slider optionally contain heading, Image and content. Four different slider option available Left to Right, Right to Left, Up to Down, Down to Up. This slider supports all browsers.

Do you like to use the same scroll for your recent post instead of own content? then use my wordPress plugin random post slider.

Features of this plugin

  • Easy to customize.
  • Support all browser.
  • Can add many time in the same page.
  • Scroll left, Scroll Right, Scroll Up, Scroll down option.
  • Each image hyper-lined.
  • Have option to show description along with image.

Plugin configuration

  • Drag and Drop the Widget
  • Add the gallery in the Posts or Pages
  • Add directly in the theme

We have three option to install and configure this Image horizontal reel scroll slideshow plugin.

http://www.gopiplus.com/work/2011/06/02/wordpress-plugin-wp-photo-slider-50/
sections.installation:
Method 1

File upload using ftp

Method 2

Direct upload from website admin

Method 3

Upload from website admin with ZIP file

Configuration

We have 3 option to configure this plugin click here to see more info.
sections.faq:
Q1. Can I scroll the images in random order?

Q2. Can I arrange the news scroll order?

Q3. Can I hide any images temporary?

Q4. What is “Enter target option” in the image management form?

Q5. Is possible to change the scroll style(Direction)?

More info : click to go
sections.changelog:
1.0

First version.

2.0

Tested up to WordPress 3.2.1
Javascript added using enqueue script.

3.0

Tested up to WordPress 3.3

4.0

Fixed plug-in directory violations issue
Tested up to WordPress 3.4

5.0

New demo link, http://www.gopiplus.com

5.1

Tested up to WordPress 3.5
Avoid registering the alternate jQuery.
From this version we are using existing wordpress jQuery.

6.0

Tested up to 3.6
Added few security features.
New admin layout.

6.1

Small bug fixed (Removed echo from the code)

6.2

  1. Tested up to 3.8
  2. Now this plugin supports localization (or internationalization). i.e. option to translate into other languages.
    Plugin *.po file (wp-photo-text.po) available in the languages folder.

6.3

  1. Tested up to 3.9

6.4

  1. Tested up to 4.0

6.5

  1. Tested up to 4.1

6.6

  1. Tested up to 4.2.2

6.7

  1. Tested up to 4.3
  2. Image upload option is added in the plugin admin. With this option you can easily upload (or select from media) your images into this plugin.

6.8

  1. Tested up to 4.4
  2. Text Domain slug has been added for Language Packs.

6.9

  1. Tested up to 4.5
  2. Sanitization added for all input value.

7.0

  1. Tested up to 4.6

7.1

  1. Tested up to 4.7

7.2

  1. Tested up to 4.8

7.3

  1. Tested up to 4.9

7.4

  1. Tested up to 5.2
  2. Uninstall option added. All plugin reference and plugin table will be cleared during uninstallation.
  3. Converted admin JS alert message into WP class file.

7.5

  1. Tested up to 5.3

7.6

  1. Tested up to 5.4

7.7

  1. Tested up to 5.5

7.8

  1. Tested up to 5.7

7.9

  1. Tested up to 5.8
  2. Use plugin short code in the widget.

8.0

  1. Tested up to 5.9

8.1

  1. Tested up to 6.4
